title: X509 certificate authentication
extract: A client authentication certificate is a certificate used to authenticate clients during an SSL handshake. It authenticates users who access a server by exchanging the client authentication certificate. ... Clients can obtain client authentication certificates from an external certification authority (CA) like VeriSign.
extract_html: A client authentication certificate is a certificate used to authenticate clients during an SSL handshake. It authenticates users who access a server by exchanging the client authentication certificate. ... Clients can obtain client authentication certificates from an external certification authority (CA) like VeriSign.
